summary: SummaryBrighten and smooth in one swipe. Medicube's Deep Vita C Toner Pads are infused with 15% Vita C Complex—including pure Vitamin C and Niacinamide—to visibly improve dullness, uneven tone, and texture. Gentle enough for daily use, yet effective enough to reveal radiant, clarified skin.
details: DetailsBenefitsBrightens dull skin with high-potency Vitamin C for a visibly radiant glowImproves skin texture and uneven tone with gentle exfoliation and hydrationBoosts antioxidant protection, helping fight environmental stressors and signs of agingFeaturesFormulated with 13.5% pure Vitamin C plus panthenol and hyaluronic acid for glow + moistureDual-sided cotton pads for exfoliating and brighteningVegan-verified, ph 3.5-5.5Research ResultsResults from a self test report (After 7 Days of Use)5.6% Pigmentation, spots improvement3.5% Amount of melanin improvement1.0% Brightness improvement3.9% Temporary redness improvement43.5% Dead skin flakes improvement7.9% Skin Texture improvement13.7% Outer-hydration improvement2.5% Elasticity improvement4.9% Line improvement5.5% Elasticity improvement8.8% Skin radiance improvemen*Excerpt from Medicube Deep Vita C Pads Test Report and Survey *Results may vary.Item 2645352How To UseStart with a clean face. Before using the toner pad, cleanse your face with a cleanser to remove any makeup, dirt, or impurities.Retrieve a pad. Take out one facial toner pad from the packaging. Make sure to close the package promptly to prevent the other pads from drying out.Apply the toner pad to your face. Simply swipe the toner-soaked pad across your face, using gentle and upward motions. Start from the center of your face and move outward. Be cautious around the eye area, and avoid getting the products into your eyes.Pay attention to problem areas. If you have areas that require extra attention, you can focus on those areas by applying a bit more pressure with the toner pad or leaving them on for 5-10 minute.Follow up with your skincare routine. If you are done using the pad, discard the used pad. After the toner residue has absorbed into the skin, proceed with the rest of your skincare routine, including serums, moisturizers, or sunscreen.For external use only. Discontinue use if irritation occurs. Keep out of reach of children. *Read instructions and caution before use.IngredientsHippophae Rhamnoides Water, Water(Aqua), Methyl Gluceth-20, Methylpropanediol, Niacinamide, Glycereth-26, Methyl Gluceth-10, Polyglycerin-3, 1,2-Hexanediol, Gluconolactone, 3-O-Ethyl Ascorbic Acid, Ethylhexylglycerin, Cymbopogon Martini Oil , Cymbopogon Nardus (Citronella) Oil , Adenosine, Butylene Glycol, Disodium EDTA, Mentha Viridis (Spearmint) Extract , Lactobacillus/Lemon Peel Ferment Extract, Geraniol, Citronellol, Coptis Japonica Extract, Cucumis Melo (Melon) Seed Extract, Litsea Cubeba Fruit Oil, Pelargonium Graveolens Extract, Allantoin, Dipotassium Glycyrrhizate, Panthenol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Lactic Acid, Glucose, Beta-Glucan, Linalool, Hyaluronic Acid, Glycerin, Caprylic/Capric Triglyceride, Tocopherol, Cetyl Palmitate, Ubiquinone, Polysorbate 80, Sorbitan Stearate, Sodium Benzoate, Citric Acid, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-5, Ergothioneine, Hesperidin, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-10.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Start with a clean face. Before using the toner pad, cleanse your face with a cleanser to remove any makeup, dirt, or impurities.Retrieve a pad. Take out one facial toner pad from the packaging. Make sure to close the package promptly to prevent the other pads from drying out.Apply the toner pad to your face. Simply swipe the toner-soaked pad across your face, using gentle and upward motions. Start from the center of your face and move outward. Be cautious around the eye area, and avoid getting the products into your eyes.Pay attention to problem areas. If you have areas that require extra attention, you can focus on those areas by applying a bit more pressure with the toner pad or leaving them on for 5-10 minute.Follow up with your skincare routine. If you are done using the pad, discard the used pad. After the toner residue has absorbed into the skin, proceed with the rest of your skincare routine, including serums, moisturizers, or sunscreen.For external use only. Discontinue use if irritation occurs. Keep out of reach of children. *Read instructions and caution before use.

reviews.headline: so lovely!
reviews.comments: i have been buying this for quite some time from a local asian beauty retailer. it works wonders for my skin and quickly diminishes dark spots that follow breakouts. it is also great for days when your skin just looks a bit dull. eventually, i plan to get the capsule cream as well!

reviews.headline: Buy it!
reviews.comments: I love this product! I bought it because I saw  many latin influencers using and reviewing and all of hers saying great things so I bought it and don't regret it! Best way to use vitamin c in your face!

reviews.headline: Absolutely the best!
reviews.comments: I can't explain how great these are! Been using them for awhile before Ulta started carrying the line. Your skin feels so nourished after use.
